name: J-Messenger
short_description:
J-Messenger is a platform independent LAN Messenger based on java.net. It's powerful multithreading system lets you chat with any number of peoples connected through LAN/WLAN with your computer.

Version: 1.0.0 (Released at 29-Mar-2012)

Recommendations:
♦ You must have the latest Java installed in your system.
♦ Allow Java in the system firewall/turn off the firewall.

License: Freeware. You can use and redistribute this software for free without any modification of the files provided with the software.

Developer:
Syed Aminul Islam
